About Automic's Selenium Package ================================ Selenium is a portable software testing framework for web applications. It is a set of different software tools each with a different approach to supporting test automation. This package provides the following functionality: * Run test suite : to run a single test suite with as many test files.
=Supported versions= Selenium Server Standalone 2.53.1
=Limitations= (none)
=Setup= * Oracle JDK 1.7 or higher must be installed on Agent OS and "java" must be set as executable on the same.
* The Agent should have the selenium standalone server jar.
* To run the suite file, both suite and related html/htm/xhtml should be available on the agent machine.
=Actions=
Following actions are supported:
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_SELENIUM.PUB.ACTION.RUN_TEST_SUITE * Action Description: This action is used to run a test suite on the specified browser. User can give options other than -htmlsuite in the "Advanced Options" section.
